00030 // Required declarations for custom validators *before* including the header,
00031 // otherwise no overloading would happen in standard conforming compilers.
00032 namespace boost { namespace program_options {
00033 
00034 typedef std::vector<std::string> Strings;
00035 typedef std::vector<int64_t> Int64s;
00036 
00037 void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, int64_t *, int);
00038 void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, int32_t *, int);
00039 void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, uint16_t *, int);
00040 void validate(boost::any &v, const Strings &values, double *, int);
00041 
00042 // pre 1.35 vector<T> validate doesn't pickup user defined validate for T
00043 #if BOOST_VERSION < 103500
00044 template<typename T>
00045 void validate(boost::any& v, const Strings &s, std::vector<T>*, int);
00046 #endif
00047 
00048 }} // namespace boost::program_options

00050 #include <boost/program_options.hpp>
00051 
00052 #include "Common/ReferenceCount.h"
00053 #include "Common/Error.h"
00054 
00055 namespace boost { namespace program_options {
00056 
00057 // pre 1.35 vector<T> validate doesn't pickup user defined validate for T
00058 #if BOOST_VERSION < 103500
00059 template<typename T>
00060 void validate(boost::any& v, const Strings &s, std::vector<T>*, int) {
00061   if (v.empty())
00062       v = boost::any(std::vector<T>());
00063 
00064   std::vector<T>* tv = boost::any_cast< std::vector<T> >(&v);
00065   assert(NULL != tv);
00066 
00067   for (unsigned i = 0; i < s.size(); ++i) {
00068     try {
00069       // so we can pick up user defined validate for T here
00070       boost::any a;
00071       Strings sv;
00072       sv.push_back(s[i]);
00073       validate(a, sv, (T*)0, 0);
00074       tv->push_back(boost::any_cast<T>(a));
00075     }
00076     catch(const bad_lexical_cast& /*e*/) {
00077       boost::throw_exception(invalid_option_value(s[i]));
00078     }
00079   }
00080 }
00081 #endif // < boost 1.35
00082 
00083 }} // namespace boost::program_options

00085 // convenience/abbreviated accessors
00086 #define HT_PROPERTIES_ABBR_ACCESSORS \
00087   inline bool get_bool(const String &name) { return get<bool>(name); } \
00088   inline String get_str(const String &name) { return get<String>(name); } \
00089   inline Strings get_strs(const String &name) { return get<Strings>(name); } \
00090   inline uint16_t get_i16(const String &name) { return get<uint16_t>(name); } \
00091   inline int32_t get_i32(const String &name) { return get<int32_t>(name); } \
00092   inline int64_t get_i64(const String &name) { return get<int64_t>(name); } \
00093   inline Int64s get_i64s(const String &name) { return get<Int64s>(name); } \
00094   inline double get_f64(const String &name) { return get<double>(name); } \
00095   inline Doubles get_f64s(const String &name) { return get<Doubles>(name); } \
00096   inline bool get_bool(const String &name, bool default_value) { \
00097     return get(name, default_value); \
00098   } \
00099   inline String get_str(const String &name, const String &default_value) { \
00100     return get(name, default_value); \
00101   } \
00102   inline Strings get_strs(const String &name, const Strings &default_value) { \
00103     return get(name, default_value); \
00104   } \
00105   inline uint16_t get_i16(const String &name, uint16_t default_value) { \
00106     return get(name, default_value); \
00107   } \
00108   inline int32_t get_i32(const String &name, int32_t default_value) { \
00109     return get(name, default_value); \
00110   } \
00111   inline int64_t get_i64(const String &name, int64_t default_value) { \
00112     return get(name, default_value); \
00113   } \
00114   inline Int64s get_i64s(const String &name, const Int64s &default_value) { \
00115     return get(name, default_value); \
00116   } \

00118     return get(name, default_value); \
00119   } \

00180 typedef Po::options_description PropertiesDesc;
00181 typedef Po::positional_options_description PositionalDesc;
00182 
00183 class Properties : public ReferenceCount {
00184   typedef Po::variable_value Value;
00185   typedef Po::variables_map Map;
00186   typedef std::pair<Map::iterator, bool> InsRet;
00187   typedef std::map<String, String> AliasMap;
00188 
00189 public:
00190   Properties() : m_need_alias_sync(false) {}
00191   Properties(const String &filename, const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00192              bool allow_unregistered = false)
00193     : m_need_alias_sync(false) { load(filename, desc, allow_unregistered); }
00194 
00202   void load(const String &filename, const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00203             bool allow_unregistered = false);
00204 
00215   void
00216   parse_args(int argc, char *argv[], const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00217              const PropertiesDesc *hidden = 0, const PositionalDesc *p = 0,
00218              bool allow_unregistered = false);
00219 
00223   void
00224   parse_args(const std::vector<String> &args, const PropertiesDesc &desc,
00225              const PropertiesDesc *hidden = 0, const PositionalDesc *p = 0,
00226              bool allow_unregistered = false);
00227 
00231   void notify();
00232 
00238   template <typename T>
00239   T get(const String &name) const {
00240     try { return m_map[name].template as<T>(); }
00241     catch (std::exception &e) {
00242       HT_THROWF(Error::CONFIG_GET_ERROR, "getting value of '%s': %s",
00243                 name.c_str(), e.what());
00244     }
00245   }
00246 
00256   template <typename T>
00257   T get(const String &name, const T &default_value) const {
00258     try {
00259       Map::const_iterator it = m_map.find(name);
00260 
00261       if (it != m_map.end())
00262         return (*it).second.template as<T>();
00263 
00264       return default_value;
00265     }
00266     catch (std::exception &e) {
00267       HT_THROWF(Error::CONFIG_GET_ERROR, "getting value of '%s': %s",
00268                 name.c_str(), e.what());
00269     }
00270   }
00271 
00277   const boost::any &operator[](const String &name) const {
00278     return m_map[name].value();
00279   }
00280 
00287   bool defaulted(const String &name) const {
00288     return m_map[name].defaulted();
00289   }
00290 
00291   bool has(const String &name) const { return m_map.count(name); }
00292 
00293   HT_PROPERTIES_ABBR_ACCESSORS
00294 
00302   InsRet add(const String &name, const boost::any &v, bool defaulted = false) {
00303     m_need_alias_sync = true;
00304     return m_map.insert(Map::value_type(name, Value(v, defaulted)));
00305   }
00306 
00314   void set(const String &name, const boost::any &v, bool defaulted = false) {
00315     InsRet r = add(name, v, defaulted);
00316 
00317     if (!r.second)
00318       (*r.first).second = Value(v, defaulted);
00319   }
00320 
00329   void alias(const String &primary, const String &secondary,
00330              bool overwrite = false);
00331 
00337   void sync_aliases();
00338 
00344   void get_names(std::vector<String> &names) {
00345     for (Map::const_iterator it = m_map.begin(); it != m_map.end(); it++)
00346       names.push_back((*it).first);
00347   }
00348 
00355   void print(std::ostream &out, bool include_default = false);
00356 
00360   static String to_str(const boost::any &);
00361 
00362 private:
00363   bool m_need_alias_sync;
00364   Map m_map;
00365   AliasMap m_alias_map;
00366 };

00368 typedef intrusive_ptr<Properties> PropertiesPtr;
00369 
00373 class SubProperties {
00374 public:
00375   SubProperties(PropertiesPtr &props, const String &prefix)
00376     : m_props(props), m_prefix(prefix) { }
00377 
00378   String full_name(const String &name) const { return m_prefix + name; }
00379 
00380   template <typename T>
00381   T get(const String &name) const {
00382     return m_props->get<T>(full_name(name));
00383   }
00384 
00385   template <typename T>
00386   T get(const String &name, const T &default_value) const {
00387     return m_props->get(full_name(name), default_value);
00388   }
00389 
00390   bool defaulted(const String &name) const {
00391     return m_props->defaulted(full_name(name));
00392   }
00393 
00394   bool has(const String &name) const {
00395     return m_props->has(full_name(name));
00396   }
00397 
00398   HT_PROPERTIES_ABBR_ACCESSORS
00399 
00400 private:
00401   PropertiesPtr m_props;
00402   String m_prefix;
00403 };
